quests.name: Investigate Disturbance
quests.description: Strange things are happening in Cloverhollow. A mysterious figure was spotted near the school. Find out what's going on.
objectives: Talk to townspeople about strange events

quests.name: Find the Mayor's Cat
quests.description: Mayor Thornwood's beloved cat has gone missing. Search around town to find it.

quests.name: Berry Picking
quests.description: The baker needs fresh berries for her famous pie. Collect 3 berries from the Town Park and forest edge.

quests.name: Pest Control
quests.description: The shopkeeper has a mouse problem in the basement! Clear out the pesky critters.

quests.name: Library Research
quests.description: The Mayor needs old town records from the library. Find information about the strange happenings in Cloverhollow's past.
objectives: Find the old town records in the library

quests.name: Fix the Fountain
quests.description: The town fountain is broken and leaking. Get a wrench from the blacksmith and fix it!
objectives: Get a wrench from the blacksmith

quests.name: Rare Forest Mushrooms
quests.description: The Elder needs rare mushrooms from the forest for a special remedy.

quests.name: Strange Sounds in the Mine
quests.description: URGENT: Unusual sounds have been reported coming from the old mine. Investigate!
objectives: Find the source of the sounds

quests.name: The Chaos Begins
quests.description: The Mayor is worried about strange occurrences around town. Talk to the townspeople to find out what's happening.
objectives: Talk to the Shopkeeper about missing items
Talk to the Teacher about strange lights

quests.name: Gathering Evidence
quests.description: The Mayor needs proof of the strange happenings. Gather evidence from around Cloverhollow.
objectives: Find the glowing shard near the school
Find the torn cloak near the fountain

quests.name: The Path Forward
quests.description: The Elder recognizes the evidence as signs of dark magic from the forest. Convince her to unlock the forest path.
objectives: Speak with the Elder about the evidence

quests.name: The Secret Clubhouse
quests.description: A classmate mentioned a secret clubhouse hidden in the forest. Find it and discover its secrets!
objectives: Talk to a classmate about the clubhouse

quests.name: Forest Patrol
quests.description: The Elder is worried about dangerous creatures in the forest. Defeat 5 forest creatures to keep the paths safe.
objectives: Speak with the Elder about forest dangers
Return to the Elder for your reward

quests.name: The Swift Tracker
quests.description: A skilled ranger named Scout has been spotted near the forest. Find them and convince them to join your party.

quests.name: The Studious Mage
quests.description: A young mage known as Bookworm spends all their time in the library. Help them with a magical problem to gain their trust.

quests.name: The Lost Child
quests.description: The Elder mentions that the Chaos Lord seems familiar. Search the library for old town records about children who went missing long ago.
objectives: Talk to the Elder about the Chaos Lord's appearance
Search the library for old town records
Find the missing child report from 50 years ago

quests.name: A Broken Promise
quests.description: The old records mention a child named 'Cedric' who was promised help but abandoned during a magical accident. Find witnesses who remember what happened.
objectives: Ask the Elder about Cedric's story
Find the old teacher's journal in the school basement
Read the tragic account of the magical accident

quests.name: A Glimmer of Hope
quests.description: Cedric wasn't always evil - he was a kind child who loved Cloverhollow. Find proof that the old Cedric still exists somewhere inside the Chaos Lord.
objectives: Search Cedric's old home in Hidden Grove for mementos
Discover Cedric's promise to protect Cloverhollow
